creator: rgacogne+asf@aquaray.com
text:
Created attachment 29960
[PATCH] Add unix socket support to apr_memcache

Hi,

This patch adds the possibility to connect to a memcached server over an Unix socket.
In a classic way, a server hostname beginning with a '/' is treated as an Unix socket path. 

This patch has been produced against the APR trunk and does not break the API or ABI.

Regards,

Remi Gacogne
Aqua Ray SAS
Committed to trunk, backported to apr-util v1.5. Thanks for this.
creator: minfrin@sharp.fm
